name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#AZKi生誕祭2022 【ゲスト：ときのそら ⧸ 星街すいせい】 [y3Ed1eCwuOA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening title screen for AZKi's Birthday Celebration 2022 featuring static noise and anticipation.
AZKi appears on stage and performs a cover of 'Miren Record' by Tokino Sora.

subtitles.original: 未練レコード / 歌：ときのそら / 動画：チーム友人A
subtitles.english: Miren Record / Vocals: Tokino Sora / Video: Team Yuujin A

subtitles.original: こんあづきー！みんな、AZKi生誕祭に来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Kon-AZKi! Everyone, thank you for coming to AZKi's Birthday Celebration!

subtitles.original: 一緒に盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's get excited together!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: そう　見つけた　この先だけの世界を
subtitles.english: So, I found it, a world just for the future

subtitles.original: 止まりかけていた時を進めるための
subtitles.english: To advance the time that had almost stopped

subtitles.original: こんなはずなかった　ふともれた言葉さえ
subtitles.english: Even the words that accidentally leaked out, that shouldn't have been

subtitles.original: あんな日も良かった　そう思える君がいるよ
subtitles.english: You are here, making me think those days were good too

subtitles.original: 消えかけても　見えなくても　ここに私はいる
subtitles.english: Even if I fade, even if I'm invisible, I am here

subtitles.original: 暗闇の世界さえ　越えてく光を
subtitles.english: A light that crosses even the world of darkness

subtitles.original: 間違っても　無くなっても　僕の選ぶ世界
subtitles.english: Even if I'm wrong, even if it's gone, the world I choose

subtitles.original: 思い描いた花じゃなくたって　この種咲かすよ
subtitles.english: Even if it's not the flower I imagined, I'll make this seed bloom

subtitles.original: みんな、お祝いの声、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for the celebratory voices!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: ああ　見つけた　失くしかけてた僕の座標
subtitles.english: Ah, I found it, my coordinates that I almost lost

subtitles.original: エンドロールには早すぎると気付いた
subtitles.english: I realized it's too early for the end credits

subtitles.original: 僕だけじゃないんだ　気付けば側にいたんだ
subtitles.english: I'm not the only one, I realized you were by my side

subtitles.original: 足跡は続く　ほら聞こえる次の音が
subtitles.english: The footprints continue, look, I can hear the next sound

subtitles.original: 届かなくても　憧れを背に少しだけ追い越した
subtitles.english: Even if I can't reach, with longing on my back, I overtook just a little

subtitles.original: 花と咲くその日まで　思いを歌うよ
subtitles.english: Until the day it blooms as a flower, I'll sing my feelings

subtitles.original: 途切れた糸　また繋がるそんな世界があるよ
subtitles.english: Broken threads, reconnected again, such a world exists

subtitles.original: 次の夜空に光る星々に希望を託そう
subtitles.english: Let's entrust hope to the stars shining in the next night sky
